scripts.build:android:uat: cross-env-shell ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_android_uat "npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease"
scripts.build:android:stg: cross-env-shell ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_android_stg "npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease"
scripts.build:android:prd: cross-env-shell ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_android_prd "npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease"
scripts.ios:uat: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_uat && npm run clean:ios && react-native run-ios
scripts.ios:stg: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_stg && npm run clean:ios && react-native run-ios
scripts.ios:prd: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_prd && npm run clean:ios && react-native run-ios
scripts.build:ios:uat: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_uat && npm run clean:ios && npm run bundle:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace example.xcworkspace -scheme 'example' -configuration Release 'COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO' -archivePath example.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath example.xcarchive -exportPath ./ -exportOptionsPlist ../export_options.plist
scripts.build:ios:stg: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_stg && npm run clean:ios && npm run bundle:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace example.xcworkspace -scheme 'example' -configuration Release 'COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO' -archivePath example.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath example.xcarchive -exportPath ./ -exportOptionsPlist ../export_options.plist
scripts.build:ios:prd: export IOS_DEPENDENCY=$npm_package_config_ios_prd && npm run clean:ios && npm run bundle:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace example.xcworkspace -scheme 'example' -configuration Release 'COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO' -archivePath example.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath example.xcarchive -exportPath ./ -exportOptionsPlist ../export_options.plist
scripts.clean:ios: rm -rf ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock; cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
